casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Jones, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Jones, 100 Ohio St.3d 170, 2003-Ohio-5278.]

(No. 2003-0790 Submitted September 24, 2003 Decided October 22, 2003.) Sherri Bevan Walsh, Summit County Prosecuting Attorney, and Richard S. Kasay, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Nicholas Swyrydenko, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Klein v. Leis, 99 Ohio St.3d 537, 2003-Ohio-4779, 795 N.E.2d 633.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissenting.

{¶ 2} I respectfully dissent for the reasons expressed in Justice O’Connor’s dissent in Klein v. Leis, 99 Ohio St.3d 537, 2003-Ohio-4779, 795 N.E.2d 633.

O’Connor, J., concurs in the foregoing dissenting opinion.
